meta.review_title: VODACOM CUSTOMER CONTACT CENTRE NOT VERY HELPFUL
meta.review_content: Vodacom has invoiced me a larger than usual bill and i have been trying to get hold of soemone from their customer care call centre (082 135) to query this.  I have tried all their prompts. but I either end up being sent to a  "robot" called Tobi who isnt very helpful or the voice prompt tells me that my Vodacom number does not exist. How on earth can my number not exist ?? All i am trying to do is speak to someone (a human, not a robot)to help me explain why my bill is so high. i cannot understand why something so simple is becoming a very hard and frustrating ordeal.
